During a conference call with reporters he said: I'm nervous but I'm also confident that it was the right thing to do. I think it should be a life-changing prize and just to be clear, this isn't a dressed-up$ 5 million. This is a guaranteed$ 5 million payable to the winner. The recording, marketing and video costs are completely separate to that. It will be paid over five years at$ 1 million a year. When Donald Trump said he wished there were a "fantastic" Republican candidate so he would not have to consider running himself, Ron Paul supporters shouted, " Ron Paul " as an alternative. Donald Trump said: I like Ron Paul . I think he's a good guy, but honestly he just has zero chance of getting elected. Everyone cheered except the Ron Paul supporters.
